synopsis.text:
Black Rose, Kite, and their fellow adventurers are all set to embark on a unique quest within the virtual realm of 'The World,' an immersive MMORPG. Gathering at a lively pub, old pals and seldom-seen comrades come together, with some even striking up new connections. United by an invitation from the enigmatic hacker Helba, the group ventures forth to an event in the Net Slums, where an unforgettable celebration beckons them.

This special gathering, titled ".hack//SIGN: Unison," serves as an epilogue to the enthralling ".hack//SIGN" series and its associated video games. The guest list includes a diverse array of characters from the broader ".hack//" universe: Tsukasa, Bear, BT, Mimiru, Subaru, Silver Knight, Sora, Crim, Kite, Black Rose, Mistral, Balmung, Orca, Elk, and Mia.

With 'The World' now purged of viruses and other dangers, Kite—adorned with the Twilight Bracelet—remains vigilant against any lingering threats. Meanwhile, the colorful cast of the .hack//SIGN series and games continue to revel in their digital escapades. As they look forward to an upcoming celebration, Helba masterfully orchestrates a plan, allowing Tsukasa, Mimiru, Kite, Elk, and the rest of their friends to reunite for one final, memorable party.
